meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with beautiful rosebays.
meanings.sent2: I planted some rosebays in my backyard.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid nuts among the rosebays.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bloomed like a field of rosebays.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the rosebays lingered in the air.

meanings.sent1: We admired the colorful rosebays in the park.
meanings.sent2: The bouquet was a mix of different rosebays.
meanings.sent3: The children played hide-and-seek behind the rosebays.
meanings.sent4: The shelves were lined with books like rosebays in a garden.
meanings.sent5: The market was bustling with vendors selling fresh rosebays.
